title: Yin Yang Activation System - Switch Flipped 100%

codebase_integration.routing_logic: All content automatically routed based on entity and channel strategy
codebase_integration.entity_detection: Entities automatically detected and routed to appropriate strategy
codebase_integration.channel_assignment: Channels automatically assigned based on content and entity
codebase_integration.content_optimization: Content automatically optimized for YIN or YANG strategy
codebase_integration.transformation_tracking: Transformation tracked for both YIN and YANG strategies

the_switch.message: The switch is flipped. Yin Yang principle is active across all channels, all entities, all content. Divide and conquer is operational.
